DOC.brief_title: The Effect Dry Needling Trunk Muscle Function Low Back Pain Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Dry needle muscle mainly use management pain musculoskeletal disorder . Yet , association dry needling motor performance muscle still unclear . This study aim investigate immediate effect dry needling lumbar multifidus muscle ' function healthy low back pain subject . The sample divide : low back pain group control ( healthy ) group . Both group receive dry needle lumbar multifidus muscle use deep insertion technique 4 needle ( 2 side spine ) . The needle leave situ 10 minute . Ultrasound image use measure multifidus muscle ' thickness , pre post- procedure rest prone position contralateral active straight leg extension .
DOC.criteria: Age : 1860 year . Healthy individual individual main complaint low back pain ( LBP ) Patients `` red flag '' serious spinal condition , example : tumor , compression fracture , infection , cancer . Signs nerve root compression ( positive straight leg raise < 45 degree , decrease reflex , decrease sensation decrease strength low extremity ) . Pregnancy . Previous surgery lumbar spine History congenital lumbar pelvic anomaly Physical therapy LBP provide 6 month prior participation study Patients unable lie prone 30 minute .
